task.title: Creating and Posting an Invoice
task.abstract: Create invoices from the Sales Order tab by defining the Posting Entity as Invoice. To post invoices created by the sales order, staff users must update the Posting Status to Posted. Consequently, all related invoices are posted, creating the associated journal entries in the GL.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Sales Order tab in the eBusiness app and click New.
Select the Account or Contact using the lookups. Additionally, select the associated value from the Entity picklist.
Select Invoice and Simple Invoice from the Posting Entity and Schedule Type picklists. Click Save.
step.info: Enter values for remaining, applicable fields.

step.cmd: Click the New Sales Order Line button on the Sales Order Lines related list.
Select the Item related to the invoice from the lookup and enter the Quantity. Click Save.
step.info: The Price Override option is enabled by default. If applicable, manually enter a new price to the Sale Price field.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Sales Order record to review and, if necessary, amend the invoice. Select Closed from the Status picklist and click Save.

taskbody.result: The invoice is created, but not yet posted.

ul.li: Select Posted from the Posting Status picklist and click Save.

postreq.p: The related journal entries are entered into the GL once the invoice is posted.
